00028 namespace Hypertable {

00030 class SockAddrHash {
00031  public:
00032   size_t operator () (const sockaddr_in &addr) const {
00033     return (size_t)(addr.sin_addr.s_addr ^ addr.sin_port);
00034   }
00035 };
00036 
00037 struct SockAddrEqual {
00038   bool operator()(const sockaddr_in &addr1, const sockaddr_in &addr2) const {
00039     return (addr1.sin_addr.s_addr == addr2.sin_addr.s_addr)
00040            && (addr1.sin_port == addr2.sin_port);
00041   }
00042 };
00043 
00044 template<typename TypeT, typename addr=struct sockaddr_in>
00045 class SockAddrMap : public hash_map<addr, TypeT, SockAddrHash, SockAddrEqual> {
00046 };
